name: Kingdom vs Zombies
description:
Build a flourishing kingdom, equip powerful armors and improve your character!

Build different buildings (Wizard Tower, Ballista Tower, Great Hall, Barracks...) and upgrade them to defend your Castle.


Find mighty equipments (Swords, Helmets, Armors) and be the shiny hero who saves the empire.


Control your Hero, slash your enemies, defeat thousands of monsters!
